Add in python3-pytest test dependency. (#19)

This is required to run the tests, so should be explicitly
declared.

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Changelog.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Small cleanups to rqt_msg (#16)

* Cleanup.

Make sure to add all dependencies explicitly, remove dead code,
and put some imports in order.

* Add in flake8 and xmllint tests and fix issues.

* Revamp refresh_msgs to handle failures.

If one of the get{message,service,action}_interfaces methods
returns an empty dict, we want to gracefully handle it and
not crash.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Isaac Saito
data.message: rqt_{msg, srv, action}) Polished for _msg & _srv. rqt_action now depends on rqt_msg and it doesn't contain its own gui files.
